section.heading: Delivery of online instruction by a postsecondary educational institution.

para.text: A postsecondary educational institution may provide degree-granting or non-degree-granting online instruction to residents of the District through an online presence.

An educational institution that provides degree-granting or non-degree-granting online instruction to residents of the District through an online presence shall be deemed to be operating in the District, and shall either be:
Licensed by the Commission in accordance with this chapter; or
Authorized to operate in the District pursuant to a reciprocity agreement.
